full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I PHYAG MTSAN GYI LAS SBYOR LAS THOD PA'I LAS SBYOR SGRUB TSUL TSE NOR 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,('DI YANG DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG RATNAS BSKUL MA NAN TAN GYI NGO KHRAL DU, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA LHA'I RIGS AARTHA SIDDHI BADZRA GYIS, RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA'I BKA' DRIN GSUM LDAN RTZA BA'I BLA MA RIN PO CHE LA GSOL BA BTAB NANG RANG DGON GTAN 'JAGS GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR SHOG , ,,DPE 'DI SU RUNG RUNG LA MI STON PAR MDZOD MDZOD ZHU, ,)
